Key Match Events: MacKenzie Gore pitched a perfect game with 9 strikeouts
Pre-Game Insights: The Nats are slight underdogs today at +130 to win on the moneyline.
Post-Match Reflections: Manager Dave Martinez praised MacKenzie Gore's performance, saying, 'Here’s a guy who can win 18-20 games for us. When he’s in the strike zone, he’s really good.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: James Wood delivered with a 2-run homer
Others: The Nats' starting pitchers have a combined ERA of 4.36 and 21st in MLB.
The Nationals won on 09/29 at home against the Cleveland Indians and that moved the Nats record to 93-69.
